content: Hi. I am documenting a use case for eliciting requirements, and just noted that ExampleScenario seems a perfect fit for that. Comments?
ExampleScenario requires example instances - which seems pretty heavy for just doing requirements capture. (And I wouldn't be comfortable loosening that requirement.)
i meant the actual use case, not the requirement. so, a use case like Dr 123 prescribes med 234, then pharmacist dispenses med 234.
